item.description: An isolated storm or two is possible as we start the week

‘Mercy Chefs’ organization feeds thousands of flood victims, first responders in Texas
item.description: One organization that helped the Suncoast after Hurricane Milton is now helping Texas after devastating flooding tore through the Hill Country.

item.title: History, genealogy center to be part of Fruitville Library expansion
item.description: The new center will provide access to the county’s collection of local and regional history.

item.title: Burglar who killed Charlotte teen during home invasion sentenced to death
item.description: Ryan Cole was convicted of killing Khyler Edman while the teen was protecting his 5-year-old sister.

item.title: Turtle watchers report season’s first nests are hatching
item.description: Two of the first nests laid on Anna Maria Island hatched July 3.

item.title: Only a few storms and mostly inland
item.description: High pressure located over S. Florida will bring onshore flow which will bring a few isolated showers

item.title: Sarasota County picks leader for new Stormwater Department
item.description: Ben Quartermaine previously worked for Sarasota County in stormwater operations.

item.title: Eddy Rodriguez chasing after big league dreams and inspiring others along the way
item.description: The second half is underway for the Bradenton Marauders. One of those leading the way is Eddy Rodriguez.

item.title: Mote Marine closed; to relocate after 25 years on City Island
item.description: It’s all part of the big move to the new Mote Science Education Aquarium at Nathan Benderson Park.

item.title: Clark Road July 8 closure for Legacy Trail construction
item.description: Construction on Clark Rd at The Legacy Trail will have both directions closed tonight.
